sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: The 1985 vintage has a stronger bouquet and slight caramelly flavour.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种1985年酿制的陈年佳酿味道更醇厚，带有一种淡淡的焦糖甜味。

sentence.Network_en: They have a stronger appreciation of the importance of economic incentives.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对经济激励的重要性有了更深的理解。

PerfectNetExp.abs: But the Japanese sense of the absolute stronger with us ., 但日本人的忧患意识绝对要强与我们.
when i am weary , you make me stronger ., 当我疲惫的时候 , 你使我更坚强.
yearn for swifter , higher and stronger ., 向往更快更高更强.
the seasonal variation signal of Mindanao Current is stronger than the interannual variation signal., 棉兰老海流的季节变化信号强于年际变化信号.

The desired result would be a stronger currency , but Hungary ' s economic fundamentals are deteriorating ., 理想的结果是货币升值 , 但匈牙利的经济基本面正在恶化.

牛津小学英语6B 全册短语荟萃 ... 8.Don’t worry. 不用担心。 10.get stronger 变得更健壮 11.jog to school 慢跑去学校.
柳州市中医院团委_新浪博客 ... 9.Meditate 冥想 7.Become stronger 变得更强 8.Drink water 喝水.

entry.tran: 强壮的;健壮的;力气大的
entry.def: Someone who is strong is healthy with good muscles and can move or carry heavy things, or do hard physical work.

example.ex: I'm not strong enough to carry him...
example.tran: 我力气不够大，抱不动他。

example.ex: I feared I wouldn't be able to control such a strong horse.
example.tran: 我怕我驾驭不了这么强壮的马。

entry.tran: (人)坚定的，坚决的，自信的
entry.def: Someone who is strong is confident and determined, and is not easily influenced or worried by other people.

example.ex: He is sharp and manipulative with a strong personality...
example.tran: 他个性很强，为人精明且爱指使人。

example.ex: It's up to managers to be strong and do what they believe is right...
example.tran: 经理人应坚定立场，认准的事情就应该勇敢去做。

entry.tran: 不易损坏的;坚固的;结实的
entry.def: Strong objects or materials are not easily broken and can support a lot of weight or resist a lot of strain.

example.ex: The vacuum flask has a strong casing, which won't crack or chip...
example.tran: 这种热水瓶瓶身坚固，不易断裂破碎。

example.ex: Glue the mirror in with a strong adhesive...
example.tran: 用强力胶把镜子牢牢地粘上。

entry.tran: (风、水流等)强劲的，迅猛的，狂奔的
entry.def: A strong wind, current, or other force has a lot of power or speed, and can cause heavy things to move.

example.ex: Strong winds and torrential rain combined to make conditions terrible for golfers in the Scottish Open...
example.tran: 狂风暴雨一齐袭来，致使苏格兰高尔夫球公开赛的比赛条件变得异常糟糕。

example.ex: A fairly strong current seemed to be moving the whole boat...
example.tran: 一股湍急的水流好像要冲走整条船。

entry.tran: (印象、影响)强烈的，深刻的
entry.def: A strong impression or influence has a great effect on someone.

example.ex: We're glad if our music makes a strong impression, even if it's a negative one...
example.tran: 如果我们的音乐能给人留下深刻的印象，哪怕是负面的印象，我们都会很高兴。

example.ex: There will be a strong incentive to enter into a process of negotiation...
example.tran: 将会出现迫切地想要进入谈判阶段的强烈动机。

entry.tran: (观点、措辞)坚定的，强烈的，不动摇的
entry.def: If you have strong opinions on something or express them using strong words, you have extreme or very definite opinions which you are willing to express or defend.

example.ex: She is known to hold strong views on Cuba...
example.tran: 她在古巴问题上的鲜明观点人人皆知。

example.ex: There has been strong criticism of the military regime...
example.tran: 该军事政权一直受到人们的强烈抨击。

entry.tran: (当权者的行为)坚定的，强硬的，严厉的，不动摇的
entry.def: If someone in authority takes strong action, they act firmly and severely.

example.ex: The government has said it will take strong action against any further strikes...
example.tran: 政府声称要采取严厉行动制止罢工进一步发展。

example.ex: He has also said he will have to become a strong President to put things right.
example.tran: 他还说为力挽狂澜他将不得不做一个强权总统。

entry.tran: (理由、论据)有说服力的，强有力的，充分的
entry.def: If there is a strong case or argument for something, it is supported by a lot of evidence.

example.ex: The testimony presented offered a strong case for acquitting her on grounds of self-defense...
example.tran: 当庭的证词为裁定她是正当防卫而无罪提供了强有力的证据。

example.ex: The evidence that such investment promotes growth is strong...
example.tran: 有充分的证据表明这种投资能够促进增长。

entry.tran: (可能性、机会)极大的
entry.def: If there is a strong possibility or chance that something is true or will happen, it is very likely to be true or to happen.

example.ex: There is a strong possibility that the cat contracted the condition by eating contaminated pet food.
example.tran: 猫很有可能是吃了受污染的宠物食品而染上这种疾病的。

entry.tran: 优秀的;精通的;擅长的
entry.def: Your strong points are your best qualities or talents, or the things you are good at.

example.ex: Discretion is not Jeremy's strong point...
example.tran: 小心谨慎不是杰里米的强项。

example.ex: Exports may be the only strong point in the economy over the next six to 12 months...
example.tran: 在接下来的 6 到 12 个月中，出口也许是经济中的唯一亮点。

entry.tran: (竞争者、候选人、队伍)强大的，有望成功的，有实力的
entry.def: A strong competitor, candidate, or team is good or likely to succeed.

example.ex: She was a strong contender for Britain's Olympic team...
example.tran: 她是有望入选英国奥运代表团的有力竞争者。

example.ex: Some countries where English is becoming a strong competitor to French, such as Algeria and Senegal, may see an immediate halt to the council's work...
example.tran: 在一些国家里，比如阿尔及利亚和塞内加尔，英语正在成为法语强有力的竞争者，委员会在这些地方的工作可能会很快陷入停滞状态。

entry.tran: (关系)稳固的，持久的，牢固的
entry.def: If a relationship or link is strong, it is close and likely to last for a long time.

example.ex: He felt he had a relationship strong enough to talk frankly to Sarah...
example.tran: 他认为和萨拉的关系很紧密，足以推心置腹。

example.ex: This has tested our marriage, and we have come through it stronger than ever...
example.tran: 这是对我们婚姻的考验，我们经受住了考验而且关系比以往任何时候都更稳固了。

entry.tran: (货币)坚挺的;(经济)强劲的;(行业)景气的
entry.def: A strong currency, economy, or industry has a high value or is very successful.

example.ex: The US dollar continued its strong performance in Tokyo today...
example.tran: 美元今天在东京继续保持强劲的走势。

example.ex: The local economy is strong and the population is growing...
example.tran: 当地经济蓬勃发展，人口也在增长。

entry.tran: (因素、成分)重要的，占很大比例的
entry.def: If something is a strong element or part of something else, it is an important or large part of it.

example.ex: We are especially encouraged by the strong representation, this year, of women in information technology disciplines...
example.tran: 今年，女性在信息技术领域的突出表现尤其让我们备受鼓舞。

example.ex: There is a strong element of truth to each of these explanations.
example.tran: 这些解释每一个都很有道理。

entry.tran: 大量的;众多的;多达…的
entry.def: You can use strong when you are saying how many people there are in a group. For example, if a group is twenty strong, there are twenty people in it.

example.ex: Ukraine indicated that it would establish its own army, 400,000 strong.
example.tran: 乌克兰表示将自己建立一支40 多万人的军队。

example.ex: ...a 1,000-strong crowd.
example.tran: 有 1,000 多人的人群

entry.tran: (饮品、化学品、药物)含量高的，浓的，酽的
entry.def: A strong drink, chemical, or drug contains a lot of the particular substance which makes it effective.

example.ex: Strong coffee or tea late at night may cause sleeplessness...
example.tran: 深夜喝浓咖啡或浓茶可能会导致失眠。

example.ex: In strong concentrations it can cause nausea and vomiting.
example.tran: 浓度过高会导致恶心呕吐。

entry.tran: 醒目的;响亮的;浓烈的;强烈的
entry.def: A strong colour, flavour, smell, sound, or light is intense and easily noticed.

example.ex: As she went past there was a gust of strong perfume...
example.tran: 她走过时有一股浓烈的香水味。

example.ex: Strong colours would flatter her pale skin and dark hair...
example.tran: 亮颜色更能衬托她的白皮肤和黑头发。

entry.tran: (口音)浓重的
entry.def: If someone has a strong accent, they speak in a distinctive way that shows very clearly what country or region they come from.

example.ex: 'Good, Mr Ryle,' he said in English with a strong French accent.
example.tran: “好的，赖尔先生，”他用带有浓重法国口音的英语说。

entry.tran: (面貌)轮廓分明的
entry.def: You can say that someone has strong features or a strong face if their face has large, distinctive features.

example.ex: He had a strong Greek nose and olive-black eyes.
example.tran: 他有一个高挺的希腊式鼻子和一双墨橄榄绿色的眼睛。

entry.tran: 言行过分;情绪激烈
entry.def: If someone comes on strong, they make their intentions or feelings clear in an excessive or aggressive way.

example.ex: 'I come on strong sometimes. Don't know why.' She was beginning to feel like a bully.
example.tran: “我有时言行很过分，不知道为什么。”她开始感觉自己像个恶霸。

entry.tran: 保持健康;依旧活跃;兴盛不衰
entry.def: If someone or something is still going strong, they are still alive, in good condition, or popular after a long time.

example.ex: The old machinery was still going strong.
example.tran: 这台旧机器依然运转良好。

auth_sentence.content: He is stronger and fitter than any other player.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is stronger and fitter than any other player.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is stronger and fitter than any other player.

auth_sentence.content: We will come back bigger and stronger next year.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will come back bigger and stronger next year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will come back bigger and stronger next year.

auth_sentence.content: This follow-up is stronger on just about every level.
auth_sentence.res_content: This follow-up is stronger on just about every level.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This follow-up is stronger on just about every level.

Sentence.sentence: A house with a fireplace has a stronger appeal to buyers.

The result of constant muscle tension and stiffness of joints, many of them are avoidable, and simple flexibility training can prevent these by making muscles stronger and keeping joints lubricated (润滑 ).
Many firms will die, but the survivors will emerge leaner and stronger than before
Carr points out, that after spending time in quiet rural settings, subjects "exhibit greater attentiveness, stronger memory and generally improved cognition.
Evidence suggests the UK's position is much stronger than in the recent past and is still showing improvement.
And, by contrast, the loss of hope, is turning out to be a stronger sign that a person may commit suicide than other factors long thought to be more likely risks.
